original_title: Niagara Falls: America’s Oldest State Park
overview: Start your tour of some of the most breathtaking state parks in the United States with a look at the nation's oldest state park: Niagara Falls in Upstate New York. Established in 1885, this state park is home to three majestic falls (American Falls, Bridal Veil Falls, and Horseshoe Falls) and a rich array of flora and fauna.
title: Niagara Falls: America’s Oldest State Park
